name: Time is money (Noel Dev)
description:
So, you got ripped off, so you grabbed your trusty ban hammer, and decided to take back what was yours, but you gotta hurry up, since time is money, if it will take you too long, the whole robbery recovery may not be worth it and you will go bankrupt

Gameplay

Your only weapon is your trusty ban hammer, use it to both smack enemies at their heads, and reflect their bullets back at them, time is your money, so you gotta hurry up, also your health, healthcare is quite expensive, steal money from dead enemies so you don't go bankrupt

This is a fan game

This game was made as a fan game for polish youtuber gimper, the story doesn't make much sense if you don't know the channel

credits:
  • Music - Evan king
  • SFX - Michał górniewicz && Youtube audio libary
